summary: A utility that, given a data dictionary containing an image and its corresponding label mask, extracts the image data identified by configurable keys and computes statistical measures (e.g., mean, variance, min, max) of the voxels belonging to the foreground region defined by the label.
business_intent: Enable automated quantitative assessment of foreground regions in medical imaging pipelines, supporting model evaluation, quality control, and feature generation for segmentation workflows.
